data.comment: The match has started at Pohang Steel Yard.
Willyan is booked for the away team.
In the minute 14, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 16, Aleksandar Palocevic for Pohang Steelers is whistled offside.
Felipe Silva for the away team is judged to be offside.
Pohang Steelers drive upfield and Kim Yong-hwan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gwangju defender.
In the minute 19, Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Pohang Steelers are coming forward and Choi Yeong-jun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Gwangju at Pohang Steel Yard.
Throw-in Gwangju.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 24, Lee Kwang-hyeok (Pohang Steelers) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Gwangju at Pohang Steel Yard.
In Pohang Pohang Steelers drive forward through Aleksandar Palocevic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 28, Willyan hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Pohang for Gwangju.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pohang.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 30, Lee Kwang-hyeok (Pohang Steelers) gets a yellow card.
Pohang Steelers push forward at Pohang Steel Yard and Park Jae-woo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gwangju defence.
Dong Jun Lee signals a throw-in for Pohang Steelers, close to Gwangju's area.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Pohang Steelers's Stanislav Iljutcenko scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Kim Yong-hwan.
In the minute 39, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Lee Seung-mo of Pohang Steelers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Pohang Steel Yard.
Pohang Steelers are pushing forward but Aleksandar Palocevic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 46, Dong Jun Lee awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Gwangju make their first substitution with Kim Ju-kong replacing Marcos Urena.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 49, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pohang Steelers's Lee Kwang-hyeok misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
In the minute 51, Great finish from Aleksandar Palocevic to give Pohang Steelers a 2-0 lead.
Lee Seung-mo with an assist there.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
Kim Chang-su is replacing Lee Han-do for the away team.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 54, Pohang Steelers's Ha Chang-rae has been booked in Pohang.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Felipe Silva strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 56, Kim Ju-kong instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Dong Jun Lee signals a Gwangju throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
Gwangju are pushing forward but Kim Ju-kong's finish is wide of the goal.
Dong Jun Lee awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Willyan gets an equalizer for Gwangju. The score is now 2-2.
Great play from Felipe Silva to set up the goal.
In the minute 64, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers's Aleksandar Palocevic misses with an attempt on goal.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Gwangju are coming forward and Felipe Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 67, Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Gi Dong Kim (Pohang Steelers) is making a first substitution, with Manuel Palacios replacing Lee Seung-mo.
Manuel Palacios of Pohang Steelers gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
Goal! Eom Won-sang gives Gwangju a 2-3 lead.
That's a fine assist from Kim Ju-kong.
In the minute 71, Goal! The home team draw level at 3-3 through a header from Stanislav Iljutcenko.
Manuel Palacios instrumental with a fine assist.
Pohang Steelers have been given a penalty at Pohang Steel Yard...
In the minute 77, Goal! Pohang Steelers take a 4-3 lead thanks to a Aleksandar Palocevic spot-kick..
Hong Jun-ho Gwangju.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 79, Dong Jun Lee signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 82, Felipe Silva (Gwangju) sees red and is sent off in Pohang!
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Kim Hyo-gi is replacing Willyan for Gwangju at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 87, Free kick Gwangju.
Gi Dong Kim is making the team's second substitution at Pohang Steel Yard with Oh Beom-seok replacing Lee Kwang-hyeok.
Stanislav Iljutcenko puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 5-3.
In the minute 89, Song Min-kyu with an assist there.
Pohang Steelers are pushing forward but Kim Yong-hwan's finish is wide of the goal.
Dong Jun Lee awards Gwangju a goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
Aleksandar Palocevic for Pohang Steelers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 5-3.
Park Jae-woo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
It seems as if Park Jae-woo is unable to continue. Kim Ju-hwan replaces him for the home team.
